qolmat.imputations.rpca.utils.utils.approx_rank

qolmat.imputations.rpca.utils.utils.approx_rank(M: numpy.ndarray[Any, numpy.dtype[numpy.typing._generic_alias.ScalarType]], threshold: Optional[float] = 0.95) → int[source]

Estimate a superior rank of a matrix M by SVD

Parameters
MNDArray

matrix

thfloat, optional

fraction of the cumulative sum of the singular values, by default 0.95
